permissions: Admins can update prediction subject gaps. Non-admins can update gaps when they have a prediction subject membership with can_manage_gaps=true.
side_effects: Updates fields on a prediction subject gap.
validation_notes: The <id> argument is required. At least one of --gap-type or --status must be provided. --gap-type must be one of: actual_vs_walk_away, actual_vs_consensus, walk_away_vs_consensus. --status must be one of: pending, approved. prediction_subject_id must be unique per gap_type; changing gap-type can fail if another gap of the same type exists for the subject.

flags.name: --gap-type
flags.description: Gap type (actual_vs_walk_away, actual_vs_consensus, walk_away_vs_consensus). Example: --gap-type actual_vs_consensus
